name: Lost In Couch
description:
I wanted to smoke so bad. I put a cigarette in my mouth and looked for the lighter in my pocket. But it slipped from my fingers and fell somewhere between the pillows of the couch. You know it is like a blackhole, and it always goes to the bottom. You know what? Nothing can keep me enjoying this smoke. I will find it no matter where it goes.

Controls: Arrow Keys(WASD) or mouse(virtual joystick)

Our submission for Ludum Dare 48 : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/lost-in-couch

Art : Yaprak Deniz Yurt

Programming : Serkan Virani Baskurt
